title: Master Command Profile (MCP) Aliases
description: Master registry for prompt aliases and automated swarm modules.

punchcard.description: Generates a new JSON punchcard file summarizing session activities.

dspy_chat_summarizer.purpose: Extracts key metadata from raw chat logs for daily reporting.

dspy_commit.purpose: Standardized and safe Git commit module for swarm agents.

dspy_daily_summary_generator.purpose: Synthesizes individual session summaries into a comprehensive daily markdown.

dspy_screenshot_organizer.purpose: Forensically organizes and indexes session screenshots.
